text: Mauricio Igor Rodrigues Martins (born 8 February 1993), commonly known as Mauricio is a Brazilian professional football player who plays as a left sided fullback for F.C. Felgueiras 1932.Soccerway profile ==Club career== In January 2014 he went on trial with Wisla Krakow, before moving to KF Elbasani.Mauricio Igor Rodrigues Martins w Krakowie ==Honours== ;KF Elbasani *Albanian First Division (1): 2013-14 ==References== ==External links== *Maurício Martins at ZeroZero Category:1993 births Category:Sportspeople from Minas Gerais Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Albanian First Division players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Campeonato de Portugal (league) players Category:São Carlos Futebol Clube players Category:KF Tërbuni Pukë players Category:KF Elbasani players Category:ŁKS Łódź players Category:S.U.
